pinyin: Si1 pu3 lin2 fei1 er3 de2

definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: She was buried beside her husband at Oak Ridge Cemetery in Springfield.
sentences.chinese: 安葬於斯普林菲爾德市橡樹林公墓，林肯的旁邊。

sentences.english: Lincoln replied to me at Chicago, explaining at some length, and reaffirming the positions which he had taken in his Springfield speech.
sentences.chinese: 並再次重申他在斯普林菲爾德演說中的立場。

sentences.english: After receiving his attorney's license, he moved to the new capital of Springfield.
sentences.chinese: 獲得律師證後，他搬到了斯普林菲爾德新首府。

sentences.english: The following year, he moved to the newly named state capital of Springfield.
sentences.chinese: 獲得律師證後，他搬到了斯普林菲爾德新首府。

sentences.english: Springfield was home to financial scandal so pervasive it was barely considered scandalous.
sentences.chinese: 斯普林菲爾德金融醜聞漫天飛甚至不被當成醜聞了。
